title.narrative: Promoting Sustainable Transport Solutions For East African Cities

description.narrative: The overall goal of this project is to create the technical and institutional basis for implementing metropolitan sustainable transport networks and systems and establish a demonstration corridor for sustainable mobility.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Environment Programme/ Global Environment Facility

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

description.narrative: Ethiopia
Kenya

title.narrative: Comprehensive concept for a sustainable metropolitan public transport network with a focus on MRT/BRT

title.narrative: Nairobi - Harmonization Strategy of BRT/MRT network

description.narrative: Nairobi - Harmonization Strategy of BRT/MRT network

baseline.value: MoT/AfDB MRT study identified MRT/BRT candidate corridors

target.value: Comprehensive MRT/BRT citywide network plan with phasing plan and conceptual design for Phase 1 (2012)

title.narrative: Addis Ababa - Strategy and design developed for a comprehensive citywide and integrated public transport network

description.narrative: Addis Ababa - Strategy and design developed for a comprehensive citywide and integrated public transport network

baseline.value: Addis Ababa Master Plan with no integrated sustainable transport strategy

target.value: Review and recommendations for embedding sustainable transport solutions into Master Plan (2011); Design for a comprehensive sustainable integrated transport network (2012).

title.narrative: Parking management study and measures

description.narrative: Parking management study and measures

baseline.value: 600 parking spots removed along sustainable transport corridor; Parking policy

target.value: Report with recommendations to the government on parking reform (2011); Government agreement to remove 600 parking spaces along sustainable transport corridor (2012); Parking policy strategy developed and implemented (2013)

title.narrative: Technical review of detailed design and operational planning for BRT systems

description.narrative: Technical review of detailed design and operational planning for BRT systems

baseline.value: Detailed design and operational plan available; Final GHG analysis

target.value: TOR for detailed design reviewed with recommendations made (2011); Complete set of baseline data compiled into report and final baseline data GHG analysis (2011); Detailed design complete (2011); Operational plan complete (2012); Construction contracts released 2012; Start of Operations 2014

title.narrative: Investors’ document and financial modeling

description.narrative: Investors’ document and financial modeling

baseline.value: Investors’ document/prospectus, financial model and operator contracts

target.value: Investors’ document and financial model complete (2014); Operator contracts developed (2015)

title.narrative: Institutional Structuring

description.narrative: Institutional Structuring

target.value: Incremental BRT management unit established end of 2011; BRT agency legally established by 2013; agency staffed up and operational by 2014

title.narrative: Improvement and construction of NMT facilities

description.narrative: Improvement and construction of NMT facilities

baseline.value: NMT improvement along sustainable transport corridor

target.value: Report on existing NMT infrastructure (2011); Final NMT conceptual design (to be included in BRT engineering designs) (2013); NMT improvement implemented (2015)

title.narrative: Transformation of existing transport industry

description.narrative: Transformation of existing transport industry

target.value: Summary report on public transport improvements (2012); transition strategy and engagement report (2014)
